properties.entry: SELECT soi.REAL_ID, srp.IMAGE_URL, soi.REAL_SKU , srp.NAME, soi.ASIN, (select name from sc_amazon_account where id = soi.ACCOUNT_ID) as ACCOUNT_NAME, soi.SELLER_SKU , COUNT(1) AS C , sfsi.TOTAL_SUPPLY_QUANTITY, sfsi.IN_STOCK_SUPPLY_QUANTITY FROM sc_real_product srp, sc_order_item soi left join sc_fba_supply_inventory sfsi on sfsi.account_id = soi.account_id and sfsi.SELLER_SKU = soi.SELLER_SKU WHERE soi.REAL_ID = srp.id AND soi.PURCHASE_DATE LIKE '{@%#purchaseDate#%}' group by soi.seller_sku,soi.account_id
